name: Gunjan Jha
bio: Gunjan has worked as a Consultant/Trainer for various national and multinational companies across India, Sri Lanka, Philippines, Russia, and Poland. At Aurrus, he leads the Learning Services unit, ensuring our workforce is equipped with the knowledge and best-in-class management practices to deliver their best to our clients. Over a career spanning 21 years, Gunjan has conducted numerous workshops for various hierarchy levels, reaching more than 27,000 delegates across 60+ companies. His credibility is firmly established across top IT and ITES firms, who regard him as a strategic consultant and impactful trainer.
